abi: event IssueCreated(uint256 indexed issueId, address indexed creator, string title)
event IssueFixed(uint256 indexed issueId, address indexed fixer)
function createIssue(string _title, string _description, string _location, string _coordinates, string _ipfsFixIt, uint256 _timestamp)
function getComments(uint256 _issueId) view returns (tuple(string text, address commenter, uint256 timestamp)[])

function getIssues() view returns (tuple(uint256 issueId, address creator, string title, string description, string location, string coordinates, bool isResolved, string ipfsFixIt, uint256 creationTimestamp, uint256 upvoteCount, string ipfsFixProof)[])
function issueComments(uint256, uint256) view returns (string text, address commenter, uint256 timestamp)

function issues(uint256) view returns (uint256 issueId, address creator, string title, string description, string location, string coordinates, bool isResolved, string ipfsFixIt, uint256 creationTimestamp, uint256 upvoteCount, string ipfsFixProof)
